* Hard reset the LOCHNAGAR
   0x29 0x0001 SMbus_8_bit_data      Write  0x44      * RST(29H):                0001  DSP_RESET=0, CDC_RESET=1

   0x29 0x0000 SMbus_8_bit_data      Write  0x44      * RST(29H):                0000  DSP_RESET=0, CDC_RESET=0
